title: Group activity template using Jupyter notebooks
comment: this is a group activity, with minimum size of 1 and maximum size of 5, where students can self-assign to groups.
text:
Comments about this assessment:

This is a group assignment where students will share the same questions and grades. In this configuration, students can create their own groups, with minimum size of 1 and maximum size of 5 (we set minimum of 1 so that anyone can try this assessment on their own, since the assessment can be not started unless the minimum size is reached). PrairieLearn also provides an option were instructors pre-assign students to teams. Read more here.
